detail.detail: Regularly: If selected (set to true), indicates a regular repeat interval. If you select this option, you must also choose the date and time for the first occurrence in the Every field.
Weekly: If selected (set to true), indicates a Weekly repeat interval.
If you select this option, you must also select the day of the week from the Every drop-down list.
Monthly: (Date in the month): If selected (set to true), indicates a monthly repeat interval. If you select this option, you must select a date from the Every drop-down list.
Monthly: (Week and day of the month)
If you select this option, you must also select a week of the month from the Every drop-down list and then select a day of the week from the second drop-down list.

Annually: (Date in the year) If selected (set to true), indicates an Annual repeat interval. If you select this option, you must also select the sequential day of the year from the Every drop-down list.

Annually: (Month and day of the year) If selected (set to true), indicates an Annual repeat interval. If you select this option, you must also select a month from the Every drop-down list, and select a date from the second drop-down list.

Arbitrary Schedule: If selected (set to true), indicates specific dates. If you select this option, you must also click a row in the Recurrence Schedule table and choose a date and time. Repeat this step for each scheduled occurrence.
